sentences.sContent: On Fleet Street, we call it “the mass doorstep” when a crowd of reporters will wait and wait for hours in hope of a tidbit of news on a developing story.
sentences.sContent_eng: On Fleet Street, we call it “the mass doorstep” when a crowd of reporters will wait and wait for hours in hope of a tidbit of news on a developing story.
sentences.sCn: 在英国新闻界，我们将这种情况称为"守望门庭"，即一群记者长时间地苦苦守候，希望得到一些有关正在发生的事件的消息。

trans.tranOther: a small but interesting piece of information, news etc
